targets.query: SELECT count("token") FROM autogen."events_v2" WHERE "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'click'  AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("token") FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'payment' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign'  AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("token") FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'purchase' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign' AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("revenue") FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'purchase' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign'  AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("token") FROM events_v2 WHERE "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'show' AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT count("token") FROM events_v2 WHERE "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'click' AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT count("token") FROM events_v2 WHERE "variant" = '$variants_pretty_mysql' AND "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'show' AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

targets.query: SELECT count("token") FROM events_v2 WHERE "variant" = '$variants_pretty_mysql' AND "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'show' AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter fill(0)

SELECT count("token") * $proportion FROM events_v2 WHERE "variant" = '$variants_pretty_mysql' AND "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'show' AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("token") FROM autogen."events_v2" WHERE "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'click' AND variant = '$variants_pretty_mysql' AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("token") * $proportion FROM autogen."events_v2" WHERE "category" = 'banner' AND "action" = 'click' AND variant = '$variants_pretty_mysql' AND ("campaign_id"::tag = '$campaign' OR "utm_campaign"::tag = '$campaign') AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("token") FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'purchase' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign' AND variant = '$variants' AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("token") * $proportion FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'purchase' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign' AND variant = '$variants' AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("token") FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'payment' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign' AND variant = '$variants'  AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("token") * $proportion FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'payment' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign' AND variant = '$variants'  AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("revenue") FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'purchase' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign' AND variant = '$variants'  AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("revenue") * $proportion FROM commerce WHERE "step" = 'purchase' and "utm_campaign" = '$campaign' AND variant = '$variants'  AND $timeFilter

list.label: Campaign
list.name: campaign
list.query: select name as __text, uuid as __value from campaigns

list.label: Banners
list.name: banners
list.query: select banners.name as __text, banners.uuid as __value from banners join campaign_banners cb on (cb.banner_id = banners.id) join campaigns c on (c.id = cb.campaign_id) where c.uuid = '$campaign' group by banners.id
list.tagValuesQuery: show tag values from "events_v2" with key  = "banner_id" where "campaign_id" = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: show tag values from "events_v2" with key  = "campaign_id"

list.label: Banner
list.name: banner_a
list.query: select b.name as __text, b.uuid as __value from banners b join campaign_banners cb on (b.id = cb.banner_id) join campaigns c on cb.campaign_id = c.id where c.uuid = '$campaign' order by weight asc limit 1

list.label: Banner Varianta B
list.name: banner_b
list.query: select b.name as __text, b.uuid as __value from banners b join campaign_banners cb on (b.id = cb.banner_id) join campaigns c on cb.campaign_id = c.id where c.uuid = '$campaign' order by weight asc limit 1, 1

list.label: banner_a_name
list.name: banner_a_name
list.query: select banners.name from banners where banners.uuid = '$banner_a'

list.label: banner_b_name
list.name: banner_b_name
list.query: select banners.name from banners where banners.uuid = '$banner_b'

list.name: variants
list.query: select cb.uuid from campaign_banners cb join campaigns c on (c.id = cb.campaign_id) where c.uuid = '$campaign' and cb.deleted_at is null group by cb.id

list.label: Variant
list.name: variants_pretty_mysql
list.query: select cb.uuid as __value, cb.variant as __text from campaign_banners as cb where cb.uuid in ($variants) and cb.deleted_at is NULL

list.name: proportion
list.query: select proportion/100 from campaign_banners where uuid in ($variants_pretty_mysql)

list.name: proportion_title
list.query: select proportion from campaign_banners where uuid in ($variants_pretty_mysql)
